name: Rush Master
description:
Enjoy a fun competitive obstacle course with your friends. More than 5 colorful levels, each with its own twist. You'll need more than fast reflexes to win, you will need patience and endurance. Race your friends to the final level, and be the first to reach the finish line, because only then you will be the "RUSH MASTER".

Designed and developed by: Mark Yasser, Bemoi Erian.
